verses.verse: וַיְהִ֡י <WH1961> happened לְעֵת֩ <WH6256> And it came to pass that after תְּשׁוּבַ֨ת <WH8666> was expired הַשָּׁנָ֜ה <WH8141> the year לְעֵ֣ת ׀ <WH6256> at the time צֵ֣את <WH3318> go out הַמְּלָכִ֗ים <WH4428> that kings וַיִּנְהַ֣ג <WH5090> led forth יוֹאָב֩ <WH3097> [to battle] Joab אֶת־ <WH853> חֵ֨יל <WH2426> army הַצָּבָ֜א <WH6635> of the army וַיַּשְׁחֵ֣ת ׀ <WH7843> and wasted אֶת־ <WH853> אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> the country בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children עַמּ֗וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon וַיָּבֹא֙ <WH935> and came וַיָּ֣צַר <WH6696> and besieged אֶת־ <WH853> רַבָּ֔ה <WH7237> Rabbah וְדָוִ֖יד <WH1732> But David יֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> tarried בִּירֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> at Jerusalem וַיַּ֥ךְ <WH5221> smote יוֹאָ֛ב <WH3097> And Joab אֶת־ <WH853> רַבָּ֖ה <WH7237> Rabbah וַיֶּֽהֶרְסֶֽהָ׃ <WH2040> and destroyed

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> took דָּוִ֣יד <WH1732> And David אֶת־ <WH853> עֲטֶֽרֶת־ <WH5850> the crown מַלְכָּם֩ <WH4428> of their king מֵעַ֨ל <WH5921> from רֹאשׁ֜וֹ <WH7218> from off his head וַֽיִּמְצָאָ֣הּ ׀ <WH4672> and found מִשְׁקַ֣ל <WH4948> it to weigh כִּכַּר־ <WH3603> a talent זָהָ֗ב <WH2091> of gold וּבָהּ֙ אֶ֣בֶן <WH68> stones יְקָרָ֔ה <WH3368> and [there were] precious וַתְּהִ֖י <WH1961> placed עַל־ <WH5921> and רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> head דָּוִ֑יד <WH1732> in it and it was set upon David's וּשְׁלַ֥ל <WH7998> spoil הָעִ֛יר <WH5892> out of the city הוֹצִ֖יא <WH3318> and he brought הַרְבֵּ֥ה <WH7235> much מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> also exceeding

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֨ם <WH5971> the people אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בָּ֜הּ הוֹצִ֗יא <WH3318> And he brought out וַיָּ֨שַׂר <WH7787> that [were] in it and cut בַּמְּגֵרָ֜ה <WH4050> [them] with saws וּבַחֲרִיצֵ֤י <WH2757> and with harrows הַבַּרְזֶל֙ <WH1270> of iron וּבַמְּגֵר֔וֹת <WH4050> and with axes וְכֵן֙ <WH3651> and thus יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> Even so dealt דָוִ֔יד <WH1732> David לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> to all עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> with all the cities בְנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children עַמּ֑וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon וַיָּ֧שָׁב <WH7725> returned דָּוִ֛יד <WH1732> And David וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> and all the people יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> to Jerusalem פ

וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came אַחֲרֵיכֵ֔ן <WH310> And it came to pass after this וַתַּעֲמֹ֧ד <WH5975> that there arose מִלְחָמָ֛ה <WH4421> war בְּגֶ֖זֶר <WH1507> at Gezer עִם־ <WH5973> with פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> with the Philistines אָ֣ז <WH227> at which time הִכָּ֞ה <WH5221> slew סִבְּכַ֣י <WH5444> Sibbechai הַחֻֽשָׁתִ֗י <WH2843> the Hushathite אֶת־ <WH853> סִפַּ֛י <WH5598> Sippai מִילִדֵ֥י <WH3211> [that was] of the children הָרְפָאִ֖ים <WH7497> of the giant וַיִּכָּנֵֽעוּ׃ <WH3665> and they were subdued

וַתְּהִי־ <WH1961> become ע֥וֹד <WH5750> again מִלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> And there was war אֶת־ <WH854> with פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> again with the Philistines וַיַּ֞ךְ <WH5221> slew אֶלְחָנָ֣ן <WH445> and Elhanan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son [יָעוּר כ] (יָעִ֗יר <WH3265> Jair ק) אֶת־ <WH853> לַחְמִי֙ <WH3902> Lahmi אֲחִי֙ <WH251> the brother גָּלְיָ֣ת <WH1555> of Goliath הַגִּתִּ֔י <WH1663> the Gittite וְעֵ֣ץ <WH6086> staff חֲנִית֔וֹ <WH2595> whose spear כִּמְנ֖וֹר <WH4500> beam אֹרְגִֽים׃ <WH707> [was] like a weaver's

וַתְּהִי־ <WH1961> become ע֥וֹד <WH5750> Again מִלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> And yet again there was war בְּגַ֑ת <WH1661> at Gath וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <WH1961> there was אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> where was a man מִדָּ֗ה <WH4060> of [great] stature וְאֶצְבְּעֹתָ֤יו <WH676> whose fingers שֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> six וָשֵׁשׁ֙ <WH8337> [on each hand] and six עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> and twenty וְאַרְבַּ֔ע <WH702> [were] four וְגַם־ <WH1571> also ה֖וּא <WH1931> he נוֹלַ֥ד <WH3205> [on each foot] and he also was the son לְהָרָפָֽא׃ <WH7497> of the giant

וַיְחָרֵ֖ף <WH2778> But when he defied אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel וַיַּכֵּ֙הוּ֙ <WH5221> slew יְה֣וֹנָתָ֔ן <WH3083> Jonathan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שִׁמְעָ֖א <WH8092> of Shimea אֲחִ֥י <WH251> brother דָוִֽיד׃ <WH1732> David's

אֵ֛ל <WH411> These נוּלְּד֥וּ <WH3205> were born לְהָרָפָ֖א <WH7497> unto the giant בְּגַ֑ת <WH1661> in Gath וַיִּפְּל֥וּ <WH5307> and they fell בְיַד־ <WH3027> by the hand דָּוִ֖יד <WH1732> of David וּבְיַד־ <WH3027> and by the hand עֲבָדָֽיו׃ <WH5650> of his servants פ
